56int AllocateFirstFreeBits(unsigned int *bits, unsigned int allocationSize, unsigned int bitsSize);
57
58// Parse the base resource name and array indices. Returns the base name of the resource.
59// If the provided name doesn't index an array, the outSubscripts vector will be empty.
60// If the provided name indexes an array, the outSubscripts vector will contain indices with
61// outermost array indices in the back. If an array index is invalid, GL_INVALID_INDEX is added to
62// outSubscripts.
63std::string ParseResourceName(const std::string &name, std::vector<unsigned int> *outSubscripts);
64
65// Strips only the last array index from a resource name.
66std::string StripLastArrayIndex(const std::string &name);
67
68bool SamplerNameContainsNonZeroArrayElement(const std::string &name);
69
70// Find the range of index values in the provided indices pointer. Primitive restart indices are
71// only counted in the range if primitive restart is disabled.
72IndexRange ComputeIndexRange(DrawElementsType indexType,
73 const GLvoid *indices,
74 size_t count,
75 bool primitiveRestartEnabled);
76
77// Get the primitive restart index value for the given index type.
78GLuint GetPrimitiveRestartIndex(DrawElementsType indexType);
79
80// Get the primitive restart index value with the given C++ type.
81template <typename T>
82constexpr T GetPrimitiveRestartIndexFromType()
83{
84 return std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
85}
86
87static_assert(GetPrimitiveRestartIndexFromType<uint8_t>() == 0xFF,
88 "verify restart index for uint8_t values");
89static_assert(GetPrimitiveRestartIndexFromType<uint16_t>() == 0xFFFF,
90 "verify restart index for uint8_t values");
91static_assert(GetPrimitiveRestartIndexFromType<uint32_t>() == 0xFFFFFFFF,
92 "verify restart index for uint8_t values");
93
94bool IsTriangleMode(PrimitiveMode drawMode);
95bool IsPolygonMode(PrimitiveMode mode);
96
97namespace priv
98{
99extern const angle::PackedEnumMap<PrimitiveMode, bool> gLineModes;
100} // namespace priv
101
102ANGLE_INLINE bool IsLineMode(PrimitiveMode primitiveMode)
103{
104 return priv::gLineModes[primitiveMode];
105}
106
107bool IsIntegerFormat(GLenum unsizedFormat);
108
109// Returns the product of the sizes in the vector, or 1 if the vector is empty. Doesn't currently
110// perform overflow checks.
111unsigned int ArraySizeProduct(const std::vector<unsigned int> &arraySizes);
112
113// Return the array index at the end of name, and write the length of name before the final array
114// index into nameLengthWithoutArrayIndexOut. In case name doesn't include an array index, return
115// GL_INVALID_INDEX and write the length of the original string.
116unsigned int ParseArrayIndex(const std::string &name, size_t *nameLengthWithoutArrayIndexOut);
117
118enum class SamplerFormat : uint8_t
119{
120 Float = 0,
121 Unsigned = 1,
122 Signed = 2,
123 Shadow = 3,
124
125 InvalidEnum = 4,
126 EnumCount = 4,
127};
128
129struct UniformTypeInfo final : angle::NonCopyable
130{
131 inline constexpr UniformTypeInfo(GLenum type,
132 GLenum componentType,
133 GLenum textureType,
134 GLenum transposedMatrixType,
135 GLenum boolVectorType,
136 SamplerFormat samplerFormat,
137 int rowCount,
138 int columnCount,
139 int componentCount,
140 size_t componentSize,
141 size_t internalSize,
142 size_t externalSize,
143 bool isSampler,
144 bool isMatrixType,
145 bool isImageType,
146 const char *glslAsFloat);
147
148 GLenum type;
149 GLenum componentType;
150 GLenum textureType;
151 GLenum transposedMatrixType;
152 GLenum boolVectorType;
153 SamplerFormat samplerFormat;
154 int rowCount;
155 int columnCount;
156 int componentCount;
157 size_t componentSize;
158 size_t internalSize;
159 size_t externalSize;
160 bool isSampler;
161 bool isMatrixType;
162 bool isImageType;
163 const char *glslAsFloat;
164};
165
166inline constexpr UniformTypeInfo::UniformTypeInfo(GLenum type,
167 GLenum componentType,
168 GLenum textureType,
169 GLenum transposedMatrixType,
170 GLenum boolVectorType,
171 SamplerFormat samplerFormat,
172 int rowCount,
173 int columnCount,
174 int componentCount,
175 size_t componentSize,
176 size_t internalSize,
177 size_t externalSize,
178 bool isSampler,
179 bool isMatrixType,
180 bool isImageType,
181 const char *glslAsFloat)
182 : type(type),
183 componentType(componentType),
184 textureType(textureType),
185 transposedMatrixType(transposedMatrixType),
186 boolVectorType(boolVectorType),
187 samplerFormat(samplerFormat),
188 rowCount(rowCount),
189 columnCount(columnCount),
190 componentCount(componentCount),
191 componentSize(componentSize),
192 internalSize(internalSize),
193 externalSize(externalSize),
194 isSampler(isSampler),
195 isMatrixType(isMatrixType),
196 isImageType(isImageType),
197 glslAsFloat(glslAsFloat)
198{}
199
200const UniformTypeInfo &GetUniformTypeInfo(GLenum uniformType);
201
202const char *GetGenericErrorMessage(GLenum error);
203
204unsigned int ElementTypeSize(GLenum elementType);
205
206template <typename T>
207T GetClampedVertexCount(size_t vertexCount)
208{
209 static constexpr size_t kMax = static_cast<size_t>(std::numeric_limits<T>::max());
210 return static_cast<T>(vertexCount > kMax ? kMax : vertexCount);
211}
212
213enum class PipelineType
214{
215 GraphicsPipeline = 0,
216 ComputePipeline = 1,
217};
218
219PipelineType GetPipelineType(ShaderType shaderType);
220
221// For use with KHR_debug.
222const char *GetDebugMessageSourceString(GLenum source);
223const char *GetDebugMessageTypeString(GLenum type);
224const char *GetDebugMessageSeverityString(GLenum severity);
225
226// For use with EXT_texture_format_sRGB_override and EXT_texture_sRGB_decode
227// A texture may be forced to decode to a nonlinear colorspace, to a linear colorspace, or to the
228// default colorspace of its current format.
229//
230// Default corresponds to "the texture should use the imageview that corresponds to its format"
231// Linear corresponds to "the texture has sRGB decoding disabled by extension, and should use a
232// linear imageview even if it is in a nonlinear format" NonLinear corresponds to "the texture has
233// sRGB override enabled by extension, and should use a nonlinear imageview even if it is in a
234// linear format"
235enum class SrgbOverride
236{
237 Default = 0,
238 SRGB,
239 Linear
240};
241
242} // namespace gl

246static const EGLenum FirstCubeMapTextureTarget = EGL_GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X_KHR;

248bool IsCubeMapTextureTarget(EGLenum target);

250EGLenum LayerIndexToCubeMapTextureTarget(size_t index);
251bool IsTextureTarget(EGLenum target);
252bool IsRenderbufferTarget(EGLenum target);
253bool IsExternalImageTarget(EGLenum target);
254

278// Get the underlying type. Useful for indexing into arrays with enum values by avoiding the clutter
279// of the extraneous static_cast<>() calls.
280// https://stackoverflow.com/a/8357462
281template <typename E>
282constexpr typename std::underlying_type<E>::type ToUnderlying(E e) noexcept
283{
284 return static_cast<typename std::underlying_type<E>::type>(e);
285}
